name: Breath Weapon
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Goblins/Example Goblins/Mutant Goblin/Mutant Goblin/Creating a Mutant Goblin/Mutations/Breath Weapon

sections.body: : The goblin can spew a line of foul acidic blood from its mouth (20-foot line, Reflex DC = 10 + 1/2 Hit Die + its Constitution modifier for half damage, 1d4 points of acid damage per HD, usable every 1d4 rounds). If it has 5 or more HD, the range increases to 30 feet and the damage increases to 1d6 points of acid damage per HD.
